explains: vt. 造成（巨大的破坏或伤害）；施行（报复）
wordGroup: wreak havoc 肆虐；造成严重破坏

sentences.en: These insects can wreak havoc on crops.
sentences.cn: 这些昆虫可严重危害农作物。

sentences.en: Their policies would wreak havoc on the economy.
sentences.cn: 他们的政策将对经济造成巨大的破坏。

sentences.en: He swore to wreak vengeance on those who had betrayed him.
sentences.cn: 他发誓要对背叛他的人进行报复。
